original_text: Anyone who touches anything she sits on will be unclean; they must wash their clothes and bathe with water, and they will be unclean till evening.
korean_text: 그가 앉은 자리를 만지는 자도 다 그들의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이요 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Anyone who touches anything she sits on
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 앉는 어떤 것에라도 닿는 사람은

sentences.original_text: and they will be unclean till evening
